summary:
Experienced exploration venture manager and all-round exploration geoscientist. Expert in risk and uncertainties, in new venture setups in frontier settings, development of exploration strategies and leading multiple complex projects with a high level of integration involved. Experience from near-field to frontier exploration, shallow water to deepwater settings. Specialist in Structural Geology and fault seal analysis. Expert in hydrocarbon migration and seepage. Focal point/lead for integrated Urban Planning, to optimize value from held Assets by integrated multi-discipline effort.

Solution-focused and skilled in filtering the critical needs from the nice-to-haves. Pro-active, fast learner and committed.

My proven strong competencies and skills are:
1. Exploration and Geology
2. Risk and Uncertainty assessment
3. Venture implementation and leadership
4. Safety - process and operations
5. Project planning and management
6. Interpersonal effectiveness and cultural awareness
7. Organizing framings, workshops and conferences

- Facilitate subsurface masterclasses.", 'title': 'Principal Exploration Geoscientist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'the Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'Near-field exploration lead; exploration portfolio management; regional exploration play lead.
1) Near-field exploration lead, with focus on: 
- Integrated collaboration Exploration-Development on prospects in mature oil & gas heartland.
- Integrated Urban Planning Lead - optimization of assets by full integration of Exploration, Development, Commercial, Facilities and Wells disciplines. Completed for 6 Assets in Southern North Sea. Special recognition award.
- Regional play-based exploration and portfolio rejuvenation of NFE portfolio.
- Responsible for exploration portfolio management and annual resource reporting.
2) Regional exploration play lead, with focus on:
- Regional play based exploration - Carboniferous - southern North Sea (NL + UK).
- Commercial projects, incl. farm-ins and bid rounds.
- Publication of Carboniferous research report.', 'title': 'Near-field Exploration Lead and Senior Exploration Geoscientist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Houston, Texas Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': "Leading implementation of new exploration ventures for Shell Americas, incl. Mexico.
- Developing new venture strategies, in close collaboration with EVP's and VP's.
- Coordinating critical elements for new venture setups, multi-disciplinary (>25), ranging from geoscientists and well engineers to Finance, C&P, Safety and Environment.
- Author of practical guidelines for new venture setups.
- Led dedicated Shell Exploration Safety Day across the Americas.", 'title': 'Exploration Venture Implementation Lead', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Houston, Texas Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'Exploration Venture Manager - Offshore Colombia
and in parallel Technical Exploration Lead for Colombia, French Guiana, Guyana
- Responsible for new venture implementation, strategy and leading the Colombia venture in operation, covering the full business spectrum, >60 staff involved.
- Frontier Exploration; Deepwater; stratigraphic plays, carbonates & fold & thrust belts.
- Operational Safety and Safety Leadership. Emergency Response training.
- Stakeholder and Non-Technical Risk Management. Received special recognition award.
- Responsible for offshore operations: large 2D and 3D seismic surveys, piston coring, MBES, Gradiometry, and environmental baseline surveys.
- Commercial deals and management of multiple joint ventures.
- Responsible for all technical exploration projects in French Guiana (until 2012), Guyana (until 2013) and Colombia.
- Strong focus on staff development.', 'title': 'Exploration Venture Manager & Technical Lead', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': 'Team leader of regional exploration projects and bid rounds in the Central North Sea.
- CNS HPHT/NPNT exploration portfolio.
- Leading global near-field exploration network, incl. global Shell conferences and guidance docs.
- Technical Advisor on structural geology and fault seal.
- Technical Assurance role for well trajectories.', 'title': 'Project Lead - UK Exploration CNS', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'Shell', 'description': '- All-round Exploration Geoscientist. Full cycle prospect maturation and operations.
- Opportunity Lead for multiple discoveries; from early interpretation to drilling operations.
- Technical Assurance role for exploration & development well trajectories - Process Safety. 
- Expert in Structural Geology; esp. strike-slip fault systems, fractures and cataclastic fault seal.
- Many publications (e.g. SEPM 2011), presentations at conferences and special recognition awards.
- Initiated and led multi-disciplinary field courses in Europe, aligned with business strategy (2009 + 2011).
- Involved in Research Consortia on fault seal, structural geology and cap rocks.', 'title': 'Senior Exploration Structural Geologist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 248177, 'name': 'dGB Earth Sciences', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEBzP9W26vMBg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519877109474?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=7yFUR9dWbQIUVL_NYpSFIG3-uG_0JNsN02seU9rICmM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/dgb-earth-sciences/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'dGB Earth Sciences', 'description': '- Manager geoscience department - leading G&G projects on basins around the world.
- Expert on hydrocarbon migration, charge, top seal, fault seal and seepage. 
- Many scientific publications (e.g. Basin Research, 2005) and presentations at conferences. 
- Skilled in seismic attribute analysis and supervised neural networks (AI).
- Project leader for development of a seismic sequence stratigraphy interpretation system.', 'title': 'Senior Geologist', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2217, 'name': 'Halliburton', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFtpbHFAokMwQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1654719812153?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=EFTBgML9Pz8f0dhPFdRTX8rvZp6D5FQs5HHNdwafnvI', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/halliburton/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 1997}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Global', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 1997}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2000}}, 'company': 'Halliburton', 'description': 'Leading geoscientific analysis on rig site.
